title: Monsters Sounds
description: 241 high-quality monstrous sounds that will make the audio of your project more cool
longDescription:
Monster Sounds!

241 high-quality monstrous sounds that will make the audio of your project more cool (we provide 241 SFX as the standard version and 241 SFX with an echo enhancement to make the sound more interesting).


🔊 YouTube link (hear the video preview of the 241 SFX)

📜 Tracklist PDF


Divided in:

- Different monsters (big monster, devil, arachnid, demon, disgusting monster, giant, golem, high-pitch monsters, reptile, werewolf, demonic imp)

- Unreal Shouts

- Monster Combat Sounds

- Flesh & Blood


Can be complemented with:

Dragon Sounds Pack

Big Monster Sounds


More about the pack:

- Editable: Easy to generate more sounds if you alter pitch.

- Recorded by professional voice actors

- Intuitive file naming

- All you'll ever need regarding monster vocal sounds

*Bridge plugin is enabled
